signals.title: Hyperscale AI Data Centers: 10 Breakthrough Technologies 2026
signals.description: Hyperscale AI data centers are now consuming over 1 gigawatt of electricity each, bundling hundreds of thousands of GPUs like Nvidia's H100s. Over 50% powered by fossil fuels, raising energy costs and infrastructure concerns for communities. Major tech firms investing hundreds of billions.
signals.significance_reason: 글로벌 영향력 및 패러다임 전환 가능성. Technological 영역의 획기적 변화.

signals.title: D-Wave Announces First Major Quantum Computing Breakthrough of 2026
signals.description: D-Wave claimed quantum supremacy after successfully simulating magnetic materials properties using Advantage2 annealing quantum computer. IBM predicts 2026 will mark first time quantum outperforms classical computers on practical problems.
signals.significance_reason: 글로벌 영향력 및 패러다임 전환 가능성. Technological 영역의 획기적 변화.

signals.title: AI-Quantum Convergence: 2026 Inflection Point
signals.description: 2026 emerging as inflection point where AI and quantum computing function as unified force. Google DeepMind's AlphaQubit AI Decoder identifies qubit errors with 30% greater accuracy than traditional methods.

signals.title: Error-Correction Technology Brings Quantum Computing Closer to Reality
signals.description: Advances in quantum error-correction bring dream of large-scale quantum computation involving millions of qubits within reach. Marks critical milestone for practical quantum applications.

signals.title: Climate Status 2026: Record Temperatures Despite La Nina
signals.description: 2025 was second-hottest year on record. Last 12 years warmest ever measured. Oceans absorbed energy equivalent to detonating nearly 10 Hiroshima bombs per second every minute in 2025. US emissions rose 2% in 2025 reversing downward trend.

signals.title: China's Clean Energy Dominance: 300 GW Annual Installations
signals.description: China's emissions stabilized over past 18 months. EVs comprise >50% of new car sales. China installed >300 GW renewable capacity annually, exceeding entire US historical total. Exported >$200B clean technologies globally.

signals.title: WHO Pandemic Agreement to be Finalized in 2026
signals.description: First Pandemic Agreement adopted at 78th World Health Assembly in May 2025. Annex on Pandemic Access and Benefits-Sharing set for consideration at 79th WHA in May 2026. Establishes fair, rapid, globally-agreed system for vaccine and medical innovation access.
signals.significance_reason: 주요 기업/기관의 전략적 움직임. 산업 전반에 영향 미칠 수 있는 신호.

signals.description: 80th UN General Assembly adopted political declaration to combat NCDs and mental health challenges through fully integrated approach. Fourth high-level meeting on NCDs held September 25, 2025.
signals.significance_reason: 주목할 만한 변화. 관련 업계 및 이해관계자에게 영향을 미칠 것으로 예상.

signals.title: IMF Projects Global Growth Slowdown to 3.1% by 2026
signals.description: Global growth projected to slow from 3.3% (2024) to 3.2% (2025) to 3.1% (2026). Emerging markets expected to grow just above 4%. Improvements in monetary and fiscal policy frameworks reduced reliance on foreign exchange interventions.
signals.significance_reason: 주요 기업/기관의 전략적 움직임. 산업 전반에 영향 미칠 수 있는 신호.

signals.title: World Bank Warns of Insufficient Income Gap Closing
signals.description: Growth expected to weaken to 2.3% in 2025. Only tepid recovery expected in 2026-27. Progress by emerging economies in closing per capita income gaps with advanced economies remains insufficient. Poverty reduction anticipated to be inadequate.
signals.significance_reason: 주요 기업/기관의 전략적 움직임. 산업 전반에 영향 미칠 수 있는 신호.

signals.title: Social Exit Movement: Abandoning Constant Digital Exposure
signals.description: 2026 marks year of 'social exit', gradual abandonment of sociality based on constant exposure, identity performance, compulsive consumption. Time spent on digital platforms declining. People moving to analog hobbies (scrapbooking, crochet), CD players instead of apps.
signals.significance_reason: 주요 기업/기관의 전략적 움직임. 산업 전반에 영향 미칠 수 있는 신호.

signals.description: In 2026, digital discovery moves behind velvet ropes. Search won't feel broken but gated, shaped by insider networks and trusted recommendations rather than open algorithms.

signals.title: Hyper-Personalization and Identity-Driven Consumption Rise
signals.description: People placing greater emphasis on what feels right personally rather than societal expectations. Keywords include 'individuality,' 'identity,' 'choice,' 'self-determination.' Wellness mentions rose 16% from 2024.

signals.description: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026 for mental peace, emotional balance, deeper meaning. Rising stress, anxiety, burnout make mindful practices more appealing than alcohol-driven nightlife. Inner peace becoming new flex.

signals.description: Emotional wellness becoming proactive and preventive like physical fitness. Emotional fitness practices, micro-therapy sessions, mood-mapping, cognitive resilience training part of daily routines. Wellness studios rolling out 'emotional gyms'.

signals.description: DeepSeek released paper solving training instability at scale by constraining information mixing to doubly stochastic matrices, enabling stable training of much larger models. Could unlock trillion-parameter AI models.

signals.title: Recursive Language Models: The 2026 AI Paradigm
signals.description: RLM allows LLM to manage its own context through persistent Python REPL, calling sub-LLMs programmatically rather than loading everything into context. Directly addresses context rot. Maintains performance across 1.5M characters.

signals.description: 2026 is fundamentals-first year where capital rewards revenue growth, efficiency, real AI advantage. Punishes AI veneer on old ideas. Climate tech losing share, crypto wait-and-see, vertical SaaS without AI differentiation hard to justify.

signals.title: New START Expires February 2026: End of Nuclear Arms Control
signals.description: New START treaty expires February 2026, leaving US and Russia without legally binding nuclear restrictions. Without verification mechanisms, deployed warheads could potentially exceed 6,000 within a decade.

signals.description: FDA approved Omeros' Yartemlea as first treatment for hematopoietic stem cell transplant-associated thrombotic microangiopathy (TA-TMA). US launch planned for January 2026.

signals.title: Kyverna CAR-T Shows Breakthrough Results for Stiff Person Syndrome

signals.significance_reason: 주요 기업/기관의 전략적 움직임. 산업 전반에 영향 미칠 수 있는 신호.

potential_impact.short_term: 산업 선도자의 전략 수립 및 기술 투자 가속화
potential_impact.mid_term: 업계 표준화 및 광범위한 기술/정책 도입

signals.title: Harvard study validates AI mental health app (Flourish) as population-level prevention
signals.description: First multi-site RCT of AI mental health app; significantly greater mindfulness among users; landmark validation
signals.significance_reason: 주요 기업/기관의 전략적 움직임. 산업 전반에 영향 미칠 수 있는 신호.
